{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Quilling {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Quilling Trebuie să iei o hârtie și so urmezi Quillwork}} Quilling or paper filigree is an art form that involves the use of strips of paper that are rolled, shaped, and glued together to create decorative designs. The paper is rolled, looped, curled, twisted, and otherwise manipulated to create shapes that makeup designs to decorate greetings cards, pictures, boxes, eggs, and to make models, jewelry, mobiles, etc. Quilling starts with rolling a strip of paper into a coil and then pinching the coil into shapes that can be glued together. There are advanced techniques and different sized paper that are used to create 3D miniatures, abstract art, flowers, and portraits among many things. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quilling)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
